overview: Jong is the President and Founder of Vwink. Currently, he is the founder and owner of iHubNet Ltd., a premium hosting solutions company - providing custom hosting solutions. He is a Computer Science B.S. student at the University of Southern California, class of 2011. He currently does research at the ISI in folksonomy and data mining - building automated frameworks for annotation and recently it has been used in one of the Professorâ€™s publication.
